description: Tony Frost is another sleeper brought to Second Earth before Yuuji. A very powerful sleeper, Yuuji strives to improve himself to be able to beat Tony. Tony seems to have no emotion, and is set on destroying the Blue. It becomes apparent in later episodes, however, that he sees himself as a Messiah when his B-cells initiate, and has his own plans for the fate of humanity.
name: Tony Frost
